text: Pia Juul (May 30, 1962 – September 30, 2020) was a Danish poet, writer and translator. She received several prizes. She was a member of the Danish Academy. She also taught at the Danish writing school Forfatterskolen in Copenhagen. Juul was born in Korsør, Denmark. In her time, she translated different things from English to Danish, including Ali Smith and Alain de Botton. Juul died on September 30, 2020 in Copenhagen at the age of 58.Forfatter Pia Juul er død, 58 år ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Danish poets Category:Danish novelists Category:Danish educators Category:Translators Category:Writers from Copenhagen
title: Pia Juul
